name: acepff
description: Post Facebook when specific Google Calendar updates event.

CALENDAR_ID.description: set Google Calendar ID You want to connect

RECEIVE_URL.description: set URL receives Google Calendar push notification

CLIENT_ID.description: set Client id allows to use Google Calendar API

CLIENT_SECRET.description: set Client Secret allows to use Google Calendar API

REFRESH_TOKEN.description: set Refresh Token allows to use Google Calendar API

FACEBOOK_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: set your application access token of Facebook allows 'publish_actions'
